name: Maildog
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam May 2020 on the theme of "Connections". Use the arrow keys to navigate and advance text.

Sunshine Town is unfortunately under lockdown orders due to recent topical events, but the mail must get through, and you, the ever-faithful Maildog, are just the dog to do it! Everyone still wants to send messages, after all.

Built in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, using some of the fancy new 7.1 features - there are no hacks in this game for once! Title card art is by the wonderful Lenny.
